Package io.github.frc5024.lib5k.hardware.common.sensors.interfaces

Interface CommonEncoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EncoderSimulation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CANIfierEncoder, ExtendedCANCoder, GenericEncoder, SparkMaxEncoder, TalonEncoder
    public interface CommonEncoder
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The CommonEncoder interface is designed to provide a unified interface between the 3 encoder sources (ctre, wpi, revrobotics). 5024 likes being able to hot-swap components, and the biggest bottleneck is rewriting encoder code because they are not cross-compatible.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • setPhaseInverted

        void setPhaseInverted​(boolean inverted)
        Set the phase of the encoder so that it is set to be in phase with the motor itself. This only works for quadrature encoders and analog sensors.
        Parameters:
        inverted - The phase of the sensor

      • getInverted

        boolean getInverted()
        Get the phase of the sensor. This will just return false if the user tries to get the inversion of the hall effect.
        Returns:
        The phase of the sensor

      • getPosition

        double getPosition()
        Get the position of the motor. This returns the native units of rotations.
        Returns:
        Number of rotations of the motor

      • getVelocity

        double getVelocity()
        Get the velocity of the motor. This returns the native units of RPM.
        Returns:
        Number the RPM of the motor

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset
